title: How do I use the activity reminder function of my B1?
answer: Set the following in your Huawei TalkBand app: **Interval**, **Start**, **End**, and **Repeat**. After you set an activity reminder, your B1 will monitor your excise load during the set period. If you do not excise enough, your B1 will vibrate to remind you of taking care of yourself.
faqType: Alarms, Notifications, Alerts, and Push Messages
